title: NJ has $12 for a T206...any out there?
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: NJ has $12 for a T206...any out there?
posts.post_content:
Would love a T206 for the PC, any and all conditions are accepted. Preferably good eye appeal, but I can't really pick and choose with 12 bucks. Please PM or email me at [URL="njdunkin1@gmail.com"]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/URL] with offers!
-NJ
I have extra funds, hooray! 14.50 now, anyone have some?
I got $4 in my paypal account you can have towards it. you now have $18.50.

[quote name="thescooper" post=1520613]I got $4 in my paypal account you can have towards it. you now have $18.50.[/QUOTE]

You the man, scoop!

[quote name="thescooper" post=1520613]i got $4 in my paypal account you can have towards it. You now have $18.50.[/quote]

lol
This has to be the strangest thread I've ever seen.

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1520926]This has to be the strangest thread I've ever seen.[/QUOTE]

agreed.

Dear Sir (njdunkin1),

I would like to show some love by giving your T206 collection a jump start.

Please pm your address and I will send a T206 from my collection at no cost. I will also include another tobacco card from the same era that I do not know what it is. I only collect T206. I believe that it is the end player of a triple folder that was torn off. It is of a player that is also in the T206 set.

Back in the day, some kind sir helped me jump start my T206 collection by sending a free card and now I am giving back to you and the hobby.

Once you receive the package, I ask that you simply post a thank you here.

Take care Charlie

This is what it's all about.
